definition: (computer science) a register that has a built-in adder that adds an input number to the contents of the register
details:
noun
- (computer science) a register that has a built-in adder that adds an input number to the contents of the register
= synonyms: accumulator register
- a voltaic battery that stores electric charge
= synonyms: storage battery
- a person who is employed to collect payments (as for rent or taxes)
= synonyms: collector, gatherer
